verses.name: Genesis 41:55
verses.text: And when all the land of Egypt was famished, the people cried to Pharaoh for bread: and Pharaoh said unto all the Egyptians, Go unto Joseph; what he saith to you, do.

verses.name: Genesis 41:56
verses.text: And the famine was over all the face of the earth: And Joseph opened all the storehouses, and sold unto the Egyptians; and the famine waxed sore in the land of Egypt.

verses.name: Genesis 41:57
verses.text: And all countries came into Egypt to Joseph for to buy corn; because that the famine was so sore in all lands.
